toggle_fwd_aeb.title: Toggle Forward Collision Mitigation
toggle_fwd_aeb.desc: Turns on or off Forward Collision Mitigation System

toggle_rev_aeb.title: Toggle Reverse Collision Mitigation
toggle_rev_aeb.desc: Turns on or off Reverse Collision Mitigation System

toggle_acc.title: Toggle Adaptive Cruise Control
toggle_acc.desc: Turns on or off Adaptive Cruise Control (ACC)

inc_acc_dist.title: Adaptive Cruise Control Following Distance +
inc_acc_dist.desc: Increases Adaptive Cruise Control Following Distance

dec_acc_dist.title: Adaptive Cruise Control Following Distance -
dec_acc_dist.desc: Decreases Adaptive Cruise Control Following Distance
